titleStmt.title: The raging tempest stilled The historie of Christ his passage, with his disciples, over the Sea of Galilee, and the memorable and miraculous occurrents therein. Opened and explaned in weekly lectures (and the doctrines and vses fitly applied to these times, for the direction and comfort of all such as feare Gods iudgements) in the cathedrall and metropoliticall Church of Christ, Canterb.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Thomas, d. 1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Hauiland for Godfray Emondson and Nicolas Vavasour,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
